name: Space Mountain
description: Blast off on a thrilling indoor roller coaster through space in complete darkness, with only stars and cosmic projections lighting your way.

tips.content: Best time to ride is during parades or fireworks when crowds are elsewhere
Right side of the rocket tends to be smoother than left side
Keep your head back against the headrest to avoid neck strain

name: Haunted Mansion
description: Tour a ghost-filled mansion in your Doom Buggy and discover 999 happy haunts in this classic Disney dark ride.

tips.content: Look for hidden Mickeys throughout the attraction, especially in the ballroom scene
The stretching room works differently - don't look up too early
Great alternative during busy times since it has high capacity

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
description: Set sail through a world of swashbuckling pirates and treasure-filled adventures in this immersive boat ride.

tips.content: Sit on the right side for better views of the auction scene
Watch for the talking skull and crossbones - they give warnings
Great choice during hot weather - it's air conditioned and cool inside

name: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad
description: Race through a mining cavern aboard a runaway mine train in the wildest ride in the wilderness. CURRENTLY CLOSED for refurbishment until 2026.

tips.content: ATTRACTION CLOSED: Closed January 6, 2025 for lengthy refurbishment, reopening in 2026
Back row provides the best experience with more airtime (when operational)
Great first coaster for kids - smooth and not too intense

name: Jungle Cruise
description: Navigate dangerous waters and encounter exotic animals on this classic boat tour with your wise-cracking skipper.

tips.content: Each skipper has different jokes - multiple rides can be very different
Back of the boat gives best views but middle seats are most comfortable
Skip during busy times - wait can be long for a 10-minute ride

name: "it's a small world"
description: Cruise through different countries and cultures while listening to the famous song performed by audio-animatronic dolls.

tips.content: Look for hidden Disney characters throughout the ride
Great for hot days - fully air conditioned and relaxing
Perfect for all ages and a good rest break

name: Seven Dwarfs Mine Train
description: Join the Seven Dwarfs on a swaying, musical mine car adventure through the diamond mine from Snow White.

tips.content: Most popular ride in park - get Lightning Lane or rope drop
Cars sway side to side - unique experience among Disney coasters
Beautiful at night with all the lighting effects

name: Peter Pan's Flight
description: Soar over London and Neverland in a flying pirate ship on this beloved dark ride through the Peter Pan story.

tips.content: Always has long waits despite being short - use Lightning Lane
Flying over London is magical - one of Disney's best dark ride moments
Try to ride early morning or during parades

name: Buzz Lightyear's Space Ranger Spin
description: Help Buzz Lightyear defeat Emperor Zurg by shooting targets with laser cannons in this interactive dark ride. CURRENTLY CLOSED for refurbishment until 2026.

tips.content: ATTRACTION CLOSED: Closed August 4, 2025 for refurbishment, reopening in 2026
Aim for triangular targets for highest points - they're worth 100,000 (when operational)
Great for competitive families - everyone gets a score

name: Tiana's Bayou Adventure
description: Join Princess Tiana and Louis on a musical log flume adventure through the bayou as they prepare for a Mardi Gras celebration, ending with a thrilling drop.

tips.content: You will get wet - front seats get wettest, back stays driest
Perfect on hot days but avoid when it's cold
Photo taken right before the big drop - make it count!
Brand new attraction - extremely popular, use Lightning Lane or arrive early

name: Monsters, Inc. Laugh Floor
description: Help Mike Wazowski and the monsters generate laugh power in this interactive comedy show.

tips.content: Sit in the middle for best chance of monster interaction
Perfect air-conditioned break during hot days
Text jokes to the number shown before the show starts

name: The Hall of Presidents
description: Watch all 45 U.S. Presidents come to life in this inspiring audio-animatronic presentation of American history.

tips.content: Great way to cool off and rest your feet
May not hold young children's attention - consider skipping with toddlers
Look for small movements from all the presidents throughout the show

name: Walt Disney's Carousel of Progress
description: Experience American progress through the 20th century with an audio-animatronic family in this rotating theater show.

tips.content: Classic Walt Disney attraction - a piece of Disney history
Rarely has a wait - great anytime you need a break
Listen carefully to the theme song 'There's a Great Big Beautiful Tomorrow'

name: Mad Tea Party
description: Spin around in colorful teacups at this whimsical attraction inspired by Alice in Wonderland.

tips.content: You control how fast you spin - turn the wheel in the center
Skip if you're prone to motion sickness
Great for kids but can have long waits for a short ride

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
description: Soar through the sky on the back of everyone's favorite flying elephant in this classic kiddie ride.

tips.content: Use the pager system - grab a pager instead of standing in line
You control how high you fly with the joystick
Great views of Fantasyland from the top

name: Astro Orbitor
description: Pilot your own rocket ship high above Tomorrowland in this spinning ride with great views.

tips.content: Best views in Magic Kingdom from the highest position
Can be scary for young kids due to height
Long load time - usually not worth the wait

name: The Magic Carpets of Aladdin
description: Take flight on a colorful magic carpet while avoiding the spitting camels below.

tips.content: Watch out for the spitting camels - they really spray water!
Similar to Dumbo but with water effects
Front seat controls up/down, back seat controls tilt

name: Tomorrowland Transit Authority PeopleMover
description: Take a relaxing elevated tour of Tomorrowland on this slow-moving transportation system.

tips.content: Perfect for rest breaks - rarely has a wait and fully air-conditioned
Great views inside Space Mountain and other Tomorrowland attractions
Walt Disney originally envisioned this as transportation for EPCOT

name: Tomorrowland Speedway
description: Race around a track in your own gas-powered Indy-style race car on this classic attraction.

tips.content: Cars are on rails but you can make them go faster by pressing the pedal harder
Can be very loud and smelly - not ideal for sensitive guests
Often has long waits for what it offers - consider Lightning Lane

name: Under the Sea ~ Journey of The Little Mermaid
description: Join Ariel and friends in a musical adventure through the story of The Little Mermaid.

tips.content: High capacity ride with typically short waits
Look for Sebastian and Flounder throughout the underwater scenes
Great for all ages and perfect introduction to Disney dark rides

name: Enchanted Tales with Belle
description: Help Belle tell the story of Beauty and the Beast in this interactive storytelling experience.

tips.content: Kids get to participate as characters in the story
Beautiful detailed queue with interactive elements
Great for toddlers and preschoolers who love Belle

name: Be Our Guest Restaurant
description: Dine in the Beast's enchanted castle in this popular table service restaurant with three themed rooms.

tips.content: Advance dining reservations required - book 60 days ahead
West Wing has the rose and Beast's portrait - most atmospheric
Try the grey stuff - it's delicious (don't believe them? Ask the dishes)

name: Cinderella's Royal Table
description: Dine with Disney Princesses inside Cinderella Castle in this premium character dining experience.

tips.content: Most expensive character meal at Disney - book early, it fills fast
Each guest gets a photo with Cinderella before being seated
Multiple princesses visit each table throughout the meal

name: The Crystal Palace
description: Buffet character dining with Winnie the Pooh and friends in this beautiful Victorian conservatory.

tips.content: Great for families with picky eaters - lots of buffet options
Pooh, Tigger, Piglet, and Eeyore all visit tables
Beautiful natural lighting - great for photos

name: Main Street Vehicles
description: Take a one-way trip down Main Street U.S.A. in vintage vehicles including trolleys, omnibuses, and fire engines.

tips.content: Only run during less busy times and may close due to crowds
Great photo opportunity and vintage Disney charm
One-way only from Town Square to Central Plaza

name: Walt Disney World Railroad
description: Take a scenic train ride around Magic Kingdom with stops at Main Street, Frontierland, and Fantasyland.

tips.content: Great way to rest your feet and see the park from different angles
Full loop takes 20 minutes, or hop off at any of the three stations
Best views of the park's backstage areas during the ride

name: Country Bear Jamboree
description: Enjoy a toe-tapping musical revue featuring 18 audio-animatronic bears and their country music show.

tips.content: Classic Disney attraction with old-school animatronics charm
Great air-conditioned break during hot days
Watch for Max, Buff, and Melvin - the heads mounted on the wall

name: Mickey's PhilharMagic
description: Experience a 4D musical adventure with Mickey Mouse and classic Disney characters in this 3D film attraction.

tips.content: Features classic Disney songs and beloved characters
Perfect air-conditioned break with rarely long waits
Includes 4D effects like scents and water sprays

name: Town Square Theater - Meet Mickey Mouse
description: Meet Mickey Mouse in his magician outfit in an air-conditioned theater on Main Street.

tips.content: Only place to meet Mickey Mouse at Magic Kingdom
Air-conditioned with comfortable waiting area
PhotoPass photographers available for professional photos

name: Meet Tinker Bell at Town Square Theater
description: Meet Tinker Bell in her pixie hollow setting at Town Square Theater.

tips.content: Shares the theater with Mickey - check operating schedule
Beautiful pixie hollow backdrop for photos
She may sprinkle pixie dust on young guests

name: Princess Fairytale Hall
description: Meet Disney Princesses in their royal reception room in Fantasyland.

tips.content: Rotating roster of princesses - check app for current lineup
Two separate lines for different princess pairs
Beautiful throne room settings for photos

name: Meet Rapunzel and Flynn Rider
description: Meet Rapunzel and Flynn Rider in their tower setting in Fantasyland.

tips.content: Both characters meet together in the same location
Tower setting matches the movie perfectly
Flynn often has funny interactions with guests

name: Ariel's Grotto
description: Meet Princess Ariel in her underwater grotto in Fantasyland.

tips.content: Ariel sits on a rock and can't walk around like other princesses
Beautiful underwater grotto theming
Usually shorter waits than other princess meets

name: Meet Gaston
description: Meet the boastful Gaston outside his tavern in the Beast's village in Fantasyland.

tips.content: Gaston is hilarious and stays in character perfectly
Great for arm wrestling photos and flexing contests
Outdoor meet - can be hot in summer

name: Aloha Isle - Dole Whip
description: Get the famous pineapple Dole Whip soft serve treat at this Adventureland snack stand.

tips.content: Perfect treat for hot Florida days - refreshing and dairy-free
Try the float version with pineapple juice
Often has long lines - consider mobile ordering

name: Swiss Family Treehouse
description: Explore the Robinson family's treehouse home with multiple levels, rooms, and ingenious inventions.

tips.content: Lots of stairs and climbing - not suitable for mobility issues
Great details throughout - look for the ingenious water system
Usually no wait and great way to escape crowds

name: The Barnstormer
description: Take flight with Goofy on this kid-friendly roller coaster in the Storybook Circus area.

tips.content: Perfect first roller coaster for young kids
Very short ride - often not worth long waits
Great views of Fantasyland from the top

name: Meet Donald and Pete's Silly Sideshow
description: Meet Donald Duck and Pete in their circus performer outfits in the Storybook Circus area.

tips.content: Two separate lines - one for Donald, one for other characters
Air-conditioned tent - comfortable waiting
Characters rotate throughout the day

name: Haunted Mansion Interactive Queue
description: Experience spooky interactive elements in the Haunted Mansion's extended outdoor queue area.

tips.content: Interactive tombstones and crypts respond to touch
Look for the sea captain's tomb - it has a great effect
Only active when wait times are long enough

name: Main Street Trolley Show
description: Catch impromptu musical performances on Main Street featuring Disney characters.

tips.content: Spontaneous performances - check Times Guide for schedule
Great spot to see characters without formal meet and greets
Usually happens near the train station

name: Disney Enchantment Fireworks
description: Spectacular fireworks show with projections on Cinderella Castle featuring Disney music and stories.

tips.content: Best viewing is in Central Plaza or Main Street - arrive 60+ minutes early
FastPass+ viewing areas available for reserved spots
Stay for the kiss goodnight - additional brief show after fireworks

name: Disney's Electrical Parade
description: Classic nighttime parade featuring Disney characters on illuminated floats with the famous Baroque Hoedown music.

tips.content: Find viewing spots 45+ minutes early for best spots
Parade route goes from Frontierland to Main Street
Classic Disney experience - been running since 1977

name: Disney Festival of Fantasy Parade
description: Daytime parade celebrating Disney stories with elaborate floats, costumes, and music.

tips.content: Maleficent dragon float breathes real fire - spectacular finale
Find spots 30 minutes early for front row viewing
Features characters from many different Disney movies

name: The Plaza Restaurant
description: Victorian-style restaurant on Main Street serving sandwiches, salads, and classic American fare.

tips.content: Great central location with air conditioning
Famous for their sandwiches and milkshakes
Advance reservations recommended

name: Liberty Tree Tavern
description: Colonial-themed restaurant in Liberty Square serving traditional American cuisine.

tips.content: Dinner is all-you-can-eat family style with turkey, stuffing, and sides
Lunch is  la carte with sandwiches and salads
Beautiful colonial theming and historical decor

name: TRON Lightcycle / Run
description: Board a lightcycle and launch into the Grid for a high-speed adventure through the digital frontier inspired by Disney's TRON films.

tips.content: Virtual queue required - join at park opening or 1pm
Store loose items in lockers before riding - they're free for the ride duration
Individual Lightning Lane available for purchase
Incredible at night with the canopy lit up

name: Prince Charming Regal Carrousel
description: Take a spin on Cinderella's royal carrousel featuring 90 hand-painted horses in the shadow of Cinderella Castle.

tips.content: Look for Cinderella's horse - it has a golden ribbon in its tail
Great views of Cinderella Castle while riding
Perfect for all ages - very gentle ride

name: Enchanted Tales with Belle
description: Join Belle and help tell the story of Beauty and the Beast in this interactive storytelling experience.

tips.content: Kids can volunteer to act out parts of the story
Meet Belle after the show for photos
Experience includes a magical mirror and moving bookcase

name: Walt Disney World Railroad
description: Take a grand circle tour of Magic Kingdom aboard an authentic steam-powered train.

tips.content: Great way to travel between lands and rest your feet
Stops at Main Street, Frontierland, and Fantasyland
Unique views of TRON canopy and park behind-the-scenes
Train whistle signals are authentic railroad codes

name: Happily Ever After
description: Magic Kingdom's spectacular fireworks show featuring Disney stories projected on Cinderella Castle.

tips.content: Arrive 60-90 minutes early for best viewing spots
Main Street is best for castle projections, hub for fireworks
Download the My Disney Experience app to sync music
Consider watching from Narcoossee's or Grand Floridian for different view

name: Disney Festival of Fantasy Parade
description: A grand parade featuring floats and characters celebrating Disney stories with music and pageantry.

tips.content: Best viewing from Frontierland or Main Street for photos
Arrives at different times each day - check app for schedule
Great time to ride popular attractions while crowds watch parade

name: Cosmic Ray's Starlight Cafe
description: Quick-service restaurant in Tomorrowland featuring burgers, chicken, and entertainment by Sonny Eclipse.

tips.content: Largest quick-service restaurant in Magic Kingdom
Sonny Eclipse performs regularly - check for showtimes
Mobile order ahead to skip the line

name: Casey's Corner
description: Baseball-themed quick service restaurant famous for its hot dogs and baseball atmosphere.

tips.content: Great spot to watch the hub activity while eating
Try the corn dog nuggets - they're a fan favorite
Baseball memorabilia and vintage atmosphere throughout

name: Walt Disney's Enchanted Tiki Room
description: Join Jos, Michael, Pierre and Fritz in this classic Audio-Animatronics show featuring tropical birds and Polynesian music.

tips.content: Original Disney attraction - opened in 1963 at Disneyland
Great air conditioning break in Adventureland
Look for over 225 Audio-Animatronic birds and flowers
Classic Sherman Brothers music - sing along!

name: A Pirate's Adventure: Treasures of the Seven Seas
description: Interactive quest game where you help Captain Jack Sparrow find treasure using magical maps throughout Adventureland.

tips.content: Pick up maps at Golden Oak Outpost near Pirates of the Caribbean
Great activity while waiting for FastPass times or cooling down
Kids get a reward after completing each treasure hunt

name: Sorcerers of the Magic Kingdom
description: Interactive card game where guests help Merlin defeat Disney villains throughout the park using spell cards.

tips.content: Start at Firehouse on Main Street to get your first spell cards
Collect different spell cards throughout your visit - they're free
Great activity for the whole family between attractions

name: Pecos Bill Tall Tale Inn & Cafe
description: Wild West-themed quick service restaurant in Frontierland serving burgers, chicken, and Tex-Mex favorites.

tips.content: Great toppings bar with unlimited condiments and fixings
Outdoor seating has great views of Tom Sawyer Island

name: Jungle Navigation Co. Ltd. Skipper Canteen
description: Table service restaurant inspired by the Jungle Cruise, serving pan-Asian cuisine with a side of skipper humor.

tips.content: Reservations highly recommended - book 60 days in advance
Try the famous 'Tastes like Chicken' for a fun skipper experience
Air-conditioned with great atmosphere and theming

name: Pinocchio Village Haus
description: Quick service restaurant in Fantasyland serving flatbreads, salads, and kids' meals with views of 'it's a small world'.

tips.content: Upstairs seating offers great views of 'it's a small world' queue
Good spot for a quick bite while in Fantasyland

name: Gaston's Tavern
description: Beast-themed quick service location famous for its cinnamon rolls and LeFou's Brew in the Beauty and the Beast area.

tips.content: Famous cinnamon roll is huge and perfect for sharing
LeFou's Brew is a unique frozen apple juice drink
Great atmosphere with Beauty and the Beast theming

name: Tortuga Tavern
description: Pirate-themed quick service restaurant serving Mexican and Caribbean-inspired dishes near Pirates of the Caribbean.

tips.content: Seasonal operation - often closed during slower periods
Great pirate theming matches nearby Pirates attraction

name: Sleepy Hollow
description: Liberty Square snack location famous for its fresh funnel cakes and sweet treats.

tips.content: Funnel cakes are made fresh and perfect for sharing
Great location between Haunted Mansion and Hall of Presidents

name: Tomorrowland Terrace Restaurant
description: Seasonal quick service restaurant with burgers, hot dogs, and a great view of Cinderella Castle.

tips.content: Seasonal operation - typically busy seasons only
Outdoor seating with great castle views
